title: Fittings and Appliances
content:
Fittings and Appliances

State Regulations
§ 14-10.17 - Water glasses and gage cocks
§ 14-10.18 - Outlet connections prohibited
§ 14-10.19 - Steam gages
§ 14-10.20 - Stop valves
§ 14-10.21 - Bottom blowoff pipes
§ 14-10.22 - Feed-piping
§ 14-10.23 - Lamphrey fronts
§ 14-10.24 - Test pressure

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
